entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:26 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 08:50 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -40.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
